description: Cerebro is a Elastic web administration tool formerly known as Kopf. Cerebro is a standalone Java application (not an Elastic plugin) that allows provides overview of Elastic cluster. Moreover you can delete/update indexes, move shards or update cluster settings via web GUI. Single Cerebro instance can be connected to multiple Elastic clusters.
name: cerebro
postInstallNotes:
Service installed.

You should be able to access the UI through the endpoint created in Marathon-LB.
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS Cerebro service is being uninstalled.
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Preview packages should never be used in production!

 Requires Elastic 5.x or newer.
